alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Crawford, Sebastian, southeastern Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Cameron to near Huntington. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Greenwood... Barling... Pocola... Roland... Lavaca... Arkoma... Mansfield... Hackett... Huntington... Bonanza... Midland... Cameron... Moffett... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Bloomer... Burnville... Jenny Lind... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 321 and 327. Interstate 540 between mile markers 2 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
